title: RIP
body:
When you do really well in laning phase, get extremely fed, get a pentakill, then realise you're carrying your team because they aren't that good at the game as you (bad) and you lose. Screw afks, trolls and op champions this is the shit that gets me annoyed mainly because our support was first timing like bruh why should that be allowed in ranked theres a good chance their gonna feed rip give me challenjor team I cant win like this 
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body: get good my friend and learn to carry solo
you can't 1v5 every game and win
How do you think people get to diamond?
duo and solo carry mix. They usually come in pairs.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qbN5WzMu,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-05-17T23:27:13.342+0000)
>
> you can't 1v5 every game and win

you cant carry every game, sure. but you'll win much more games if you learn to carry 1v5

bad luck happens.
there might seem that there is nothing we can do, but actually there are many things we can do.

if we carry the team, there is a huge possibility that the team will listen to us.
Therefore, we have to keep leading the team by redirecting them, warning, etc. you can either do this by chat or pinging.

Best of luck
When ur winning, but your jungler doesnt synergize with the rest of the team so u lose all teamfights. RIP in pieces
